TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Pyanan, title = Pyanan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pyanan} }

S.FORM: Pyanan qalang Pyanan hya ga cyux beh girang keng Raytogo Pyanan song. lalu' Pyanan qani hya ga aring nkis raral lga maki qu lalu qani hya la. osa beh qalang myan hya ga, aring Girang ga pwah beh Yuensan ru htu Galang Syanoh, ruw kura beh qalang myan, qutux tuqiy hya ga pwah beh Gyuto ruw pwah hongu tayal ruw p'ubuy tuqiy Bongbong lru mwah qalang myan la. kinwagiq niya ga wal hazi 1200 meta , qalang Pyanan hya ga cyux maki puqing balay llyung mnibu, kincingay squliq niya ga 834 kwara, 249 qu ngasal cyux maki kya. kinlabang hyal nya ga 86.54 pinxwang kungli. mrhuw balay nkis myan hya ga kmomaw muci qu piqyuwan nkis myan. iyat mnwah inu ma, aring pinsbkan lga yasa siy kaki sa hyal qani muci pinqyuwan nkis myan. balay balay hyal myan kya, ruw mkhway kwara qu squliq myan kya, ini phakas, mrraw uzi kya qu pcyagun naha. misu qani lga giway muya tmana' ru rramat ana nanu qu cyux naha sqyanux. cyux maki te inu qu qalang部落位置與概況 sami qalang Pyanan hiya ga, cyux maki son maha kraya balay son maha 'tunux balay son llyung i Mnibu qani, cyux maki Yahu Quri' sqabu qalang myan qani. ro qalang mu qani hiya ga,sraral ha ga, yasa qa qnxan ta sraral laga, muya sami trakis ngahi yasa qu wa sqyanux i pqyanux sami, babaw nya lga, qyopan sami son maha kahat qani lga, maras son maha i tamana qani la, mwah qalang myan laga, muya tamana qa i kahat laga psulung sami kya sami qalang myan uyi ro, nanu misuw qani lga, qwara qalang myan ga, cyux muya i tamana qwara misuw qani lga. lalu i qalang myan i pyanan qani ga, ini ptnaq qa son maha i ziray nya wayal ga zikang nya ga ini ptnaq qa son maha lalu nya qalang qani uyi, taring balay mwah i qalang myan qani kahul i quri' sqabu mwah i thazi son maha qalang pyanan qani ga, taring balay kian naha ga, Sgmi son Sgmi qasa ga, cyux maki llyung Memutang, ro nqa i gong kahul qa sgalup qasa Sgmi son nya, baha ini say Sgmi ga, piyux balay son maha qutux khoniq Sgmi kya sraral ma, Sgmi qani ga, baqun i awa ga i niwan ma seken ta misuw qani baqun i mima he uyi, baqun i mahoq lukus uyi ga, ro babw nya lga, kahul sgmi qasa khmay khmay laqi naha lga, ini ktnq kian lga, mwah kya i Pyanan la, ana ga mwah i Pyanan ga, ini say Pyanan na, Mnibu' so na, ro imi nqa Mnibu' qani, swa son maha Mnibu qani mga, saying qa i kinholan ke qani ma ga, qutux hiya ga, q'sun balay mu syax wagi ma ga, nanu ya son maha Mnibu' ma, ro qutux loyi ga, rgyax qwara lingay nya ma ga, qalang qani ma, pira balay qutux libu biyok i qalang qani maha, nanu Mnibu' son naha, ro babaw nya lga, mwah i kyopan sami Gipun la, mwah Gipun lga Pyanan son nya la. ana ga Pyanan qani ga, iyat cinlalu Gipun ga, pnongan nya i qalang myan maha Pyanan lalu qalang nya qani, nanu Gipun ga Pyanan son nya, puqing balay imi nya Pyanan qani ma ga, sami Pyanan hiya qani ma ga, mhuway balay ma, nanu kahul Sqoyaw ini ga, Slamaw squliq ma ga, musa i mkan mtswe naha kya Skikun ini ga Lmwan mga, sqa wagi lga, hminas qalang nyan wa sraral ungat i turuy lngan ta rwa, si ta sinkakay ma mhkangi nanu sasal kahul kya i Sqoyaw lga, mwah i qalang myan lga, sqa wagi lga, m'uyay ktu naha la, muyay ktu naha lga, blaq balay qa mhuway balay qalang nyan qani, nanu i tpihun naha ro, mwah muyaw, kya su lu'u moyay la, anay misu phapuy,〝pyanay misu cikah〞, nanu Pyanan qani lga, kahul pyanay misu qani lga, kahul kya ga, lalu ni ga, kahul ke qani maha pyanay misu qani, nanu Pyanan son la. wiwal nqu wal maku skayal sa sinllwan na qalang muci, ru nyux maki smryut te yahu qani: bnkis myan sraral ga minkahul squ Pinsbkan ru pgagay squ Quri sqabu muyaw squ Turuy kacing ru tehuk squ Hbun qyus ki gong Matang suruw nya lga tehuk squ hbun Talah (又稱sgmi), maki uzi qu wal mkura sa Mnoyan uzi. Pinsbkan -Quri sqabu -沿著Turuy kacing 山背下切-經Hbun qyus -gong Matang -hbun Talah (又稱sgmi) ,有一部分的人前往Mnoyan . 1.qalang nguhu 2.qalang rgyax,近代Watan ali 頭目又從中分離出 3.qalang kska, 另外,園建社於gong Mekyup 溪畔的qalang Yuqu qalang qnapan,至此Pyanan . kinhmayan na ssquliq人口概況 squliq Pyanan nyan ga, misuw qani ga,kya i kinniks ro laqi squnun ga,kya i qutux seng squliq i qalang myan hiya,ro kneril ga piyux hayiy,paying kusa kya mlikuy tkkwaw rwa ro,nanu wa i mhokil lga,ro ruma ga m'uy naha i sraral musa qmalu,ini ga musa mnayang qmayah ro nanu ini tl'ux son maha qnxan naha mlikuy,nanu kneril hiya ga,nanu i bsyaq hayiy qnhun naha ya. galang myan hiya ga,maki son maha i aring sraral haga,cyugan kyokay nya ha ga,qutux ga Cyoro kyokay(kiriskyo) son nya,ro tesinkyo ga,ro babaw nya la,mwah qutux hariluya son nya,mwah hasa uyi la,ro babaw nya lga,hmku hmku kya naha nulu inu qa i rwa naha i snhyan naha ni ga,htux qa 摩門教uyi la,maki摩門教,ro nya mwah 曠野協會uyi la,nanu magan kyokay laro,smisuw qani lga,kahat lga,kbalay qutux 媽祖廟 uyi la,nanu son hani mita lga,piyux balay kyokay ga. sami galang Pyanan qani hiya ga,taring sraral balay ha ga,nanu I trakis ru ngahi qani muyan myan ga,wali birun ala ro trasis ro ngahi niqun ta nanaq ro ga,babaw nya laga,taring maki cikay i miyup son naha qeqaya kmukan kahat qani la,nanu si ga birun pila laro,nanu yasa lga qalang myan ga,musa i tmyase son lga,musa rgyax ro musa hnkangi khoniq i mistmaq ro scinun naha ro hmku nqa tqenux la,ro babaw nya lga muya sami yorin la,ro muya sami labin,baqun mayi uyi ga,baqun mepila,kya minkoku rokuyu nanneng lga,taring sami tmalang sami muya qanrang la,muya ta qanrang la,ana cami muya qarang ga,nanu i ini kpiyux ro qmayah sraral iway haga ro,nanu iyaw iyaw iyaw haga spmiyon ini kpiyux,kyan minkoku nanaq yo nannng lga,mwah kahat la,maras 怪手 laro,nanu i sbnhu qwara i mayah nyan laro,miyan naha qarang lga,yasa qa i pira misuw qani piyux balay son maha qalang i qalang myan qani,nanu ana ski misuw qani na ga,qalang myan ga,yasa qa muya qarang maha i sqynux i goyu neng qani ga,nanu qa muya qarang. . osa squ qalang部落交通 Qalang myan qani ga,cyan maki i tunux son maha llyung Mnibu' qani,nanu yasa i kmuyit su turuy kahul i hogan ga kahul heci mwah ga,si glux i son maha syaw llyung i Mnibu' qani,nanu si prkyas prkyas ro,mwah Lmwan laro,prkyas lga Skikun lga,yasa mwah Pyanah la.ana ga saying qara tuqiy nya ga,myuqu su musa lga,phtux su Toyen ro ini ga musa su 太平山ga,cyux qutux Pekus son naha ga,wa prkyas ga qutux tuqiy ga,wa kya Toyen ga,ro mwah laga,te Thbu son naha Roba ga,cyux qutux tuqiy loyiwa tqara loyi wal 太平山 la,nanu yasa min'uqu su mlux tuqiy qasa laga,iyat su tehok Pyanan la. Sami qalang Pyanan qani huya ga,bahaw cyux maki son maha i suru balay rgyax ga,piyux balay son maha i blaq chalan ga,ro balaq nayan uyi,pira maha sami qalang Pyanan qani ga,cyux qutux son maha quri sqabu,quri sqabu qasa hiya ga,bagan ro kmisan ro tmangu abaw ro hoqan abaw ga,ini ptnaq qwara kako nya ga,blaq balay ktan ga,quri' sqabu qasa hiya ga,taring sraral ga,yasa niqan nyan i galan myan i quilh ga,quilh hasa ga,mnbang so nyan ga櫻花鉤吻鮭,nanu sraral ga,yasa galan myamn qulih,ro qalang myan hasa ga,maki balung uyi ga,maki son maha qaling son nyan ga,nanu cyux qutux son 檜木園區,cyux qutux步道ga,okeq musa mangay qa i qaling,ro qalang myan hasa ga,cyux maki qutux son maha mqabu n ptunux cyux kya uyi,blaq balay ktan 鐘乳石qasa ay,ana ga mwani ga,cyux shtux i kensexu ga,nyux shtuy maha ta say nqa i pcyaqih i 鐘乳石 qasa,misuw qani ga,ini baqiy musa haya,ro qutux loyi hapa balay ga i觀光nya lga,qanrang qani ro,qalang Pyanan qani ga,ita Taywan qani ga,si say ma hopa balay qa 菜區nya ga,mmiyan qanrang qani,nanu musa su qalang Pyanan qani ga,ktan su qwara mtasyeq qwara i qanrang ga,blaq balay ktan.khmay balay i kahat ga. tay mkraya' na Pyanan hya' ga Qalang skikun. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

Pyanan qalang Pyanan hya ga cyox beh girang keng Raytogo Pyanan song. lalo' Pyanan qani hya ga aring nkis raral lga maki qo lalo qani hya la. osa beh qalang myan hya ga, aring Girang ga pwah beh Yoensan ro hto Galang Syanoh, row kora beh qalang myan, qotox toqiy hya ga pwah beh Gyoto row pwah hongo tayal row p'oboy toqiy Bongbong lro mwah qalang myan la. kinwagiq niya ga wal hazi 1200 meta , qalang Pyanan hya ga cyox maki poqing balay llyong mnibo, kincingay sqoliq niya ga 834 kwara, 249 qo ngasal cyox maki kya. kinlabang hyal nya ga 86.54 pinxwang kongli. mrhow balay nkis myan hya ga kmomaw moci qo piqyowan nkis myan. iyat mnwah ino ma, aring pinsbkan lga yasa siy kaki sa hyal qani moci pinqyowan nkis myan. balay balay hyal myan kya, row mkhway kwara qo sqoliq myan kya, ini phakas, mrraw ozi kya qo pcyagon naha. miso qani lga giway moya tmana' ro rramat ana nano qo cyox naha sqyanox. cyox maki te ino qo qalang部落位置與概況 sami qalang Pyanan hiya ga, cyox maki son maha kraya balay son maha 'tonox balay son llyong i Mnibo qani, cyox maki Yaho Qori' sqabo qalang myan qani. ro qalang mo qani hiya ga,sraral ha ga, yasa qa qnxan ta sraral laga, moya sami trakis ngahi yasa qo wa sqyanox i pqyanox sami, babaw nya lga, qyopan sami son maha kahat qani lga, maras son maha i tamana qani la, mwah qalang myan laga, moya tamana qa i kahat laga psolong sami kya sami qalang myan oyi ro, nano misow qani lga, qwara qalang myan ga, cyox moya i tamana qwara misow qani lga. lalo i qalang myan i pyanan qani ga, ini ptnaq qa son maha i ziray nya wayal ga zikang nya ga ini ptnaq qa son maha lalo nya qalang qani oyi, taring balay mwah i qalang myan qani kahol i qori' sqabo mwah i thazi son maha qalang pyanan qani ga, taring balay kian naha ga, Sgmi son Sgmi qasa ga, cyox maki llyong Memotang, ro nqa i gong kahol qa sgalop qasa Sgmi son nya, baha ini say Sgmi ga, piyox balay son maha qotox khoniq Sgmi kya sraral ma, Sgmi qani ga, baqon i awa ga i niwan ma seken ta misow qani baqon i mima he oyi, baqon i mahoq lokos oyi ga, ro babw nya lga, kahol sgmi qasa khmay khmay laqi naha lga, ini ktnq kian lga, mwah kya i Pyanan la, ana ga mwah i Pyanan ga, ini say Pyanan na, Mnibo' so na, ro imi nqa Mnibo' qani, swa son maha Mnibo qani mga, saying qa i kinholan ke qani ma ga, qotox hiya ga, q'son balay mo syax wagi ma ga, nano ya son maha Mnibo' ma, ro qotox loyi ga, rgyax qwara lingay nya ma ga, qalang qani ma, pira balay qotox libo biyok i qalang qani maha, nano Mnibo' son naha, ro babaw nya lga, mwah i kyopan sami Gipon la, mwah Gipon lga Pyanan son nya la. ana ga Pyanan qani ga, iyat cinlalo Gipon ga, pnongan nya i qalang myan maha Pyanan lalo qalang nya qani, nano Gipon ga Pyanan son nya, poqing balay imi nya Pyanan qani ma ga, sami Pyanan hiya qani ma ga, mhoway balay ma, nano kahol Sqoyaw ini ga, Slamaw sqoliq ma ga, mosa i mkan mtswe naha kya Skikon ini ga Lmwan mga, sqa wagi lga, hminas qalang nyan wa sraral ongat i toroy lngan ta rwa, si ta sinkakay ma mhkangi nano sasal kahol kya i Sqoyaw lga, mwah i qalang myan lga, sqa wagi lga, m'oyay kto naha la, moyay kto naha lga, blaq balay qa mhoway balay qalang nyan qani, nano i tpihon naha ro, mwah moyaw, kya so lo'o moyay la, anay miso phapoy,〝pyanay miso cikah〞, nano Pyanan qani lga, kahol pyanay miso qani lga, kahol kya ga, lalo ni ga, kahol ke qani maha pyanay miso qani, nano Pyanan son la. wiwal nqo wal mako skayal sa sinllwan na qalang moci, ro nyox maki smryot te yaho qani: bnkis myan sraral ga minkahol sqo Pinsbkan ro pgagay sqo Qori sqabo moyaw sqo Toroy kacing ro tehok sqo Hbon qyos ki gong Matang sorow nya lga tehok sqo hbon Talah (又稱sgmi), maki ozi qo wal mkora sa Mnoyan ozi. Pinsbkan -Qori sqabo -沿著Toroy kacing 山背下切-經Hbon qyos -gong Matang -hbon Talah (又稱sgmi) ,有一部分的人前往Mnoyan . 1.qalang ngoho 2.qalang rgyax,近代Watan ali 頭目又從中分離出 3.qalang kska, 另外,園建社於gong Mekyop 溪畔的qalang Yoqo qalang qnapan,至此Pyanan . kinhmayan na ssqoliq人口概況 sqoliq Pyanan nyan ga, misow qani ga,kya i kinniks ro laqi sqonon ga,kya i qotox seng sqoliq i qalang myan hiya,ro kneril ga piyox hayiy,paying kosa kya mlikoy tkkwaw rwa ro,nano wa i mhokil lga,ro roma ga m'oy naha i sraral mosa qmalo,ini ga mosa mnayang qmayah ro nano ini tl'ox son maha qnxan naha mlikoy,nano kneril hiya ga,nano i bsyaq hayiy qnhon naha ya. galang myan hiya ga,maki son maha i aring sraral haga,cyogan kyokay nya ha ga,qotox ga Cyoro kyokay(kiriskyo) son nya,ro tesinkyo ga,ro babaw nya la,mwah qotox hariloya son nya,mwah hasa oyi la,ro babaw nya lga,hmko hmko kya naha nolo ino qa i rwa naha i snhyan naha ni ga,htox qa 摩門教oyi la,maki摩門教,ro nya mwah 曠野協會oyi la,nano magan kyokay laro,smisow qani lga,kahat lga,kbalay qotox 媽祖廟 oyi la,nano son hani mita lga,piyox balay kyokay ga. sami galang Pyanan qani hiya ga,taring sraral balay ha ga,nano I trakis ro ngahi qani moyan myan ga,wali biron ala ro trasis ro ngahi niqon ta nanaq ro ga,babaw nya laga,taring maki cikay i miyop son naha qeqaya kmokan kahat qani la,nano si ga biron pila laro,nano yasa lga qalang myan ga,mosa i tmyase son lga,mosa rgyax ro mosa hnkangi khoniq i mistmaq ro scinon naha ro hmko nqa tqenox la,ro babaw nya lga moya sami yorin la,ro moya sami labin,baqon mayi oyi ga,baqon mepila,kya minkoko rokoyo nanneng lga,taring sami tmalang sami moya qanrang la,moya ta qanrang la,ana cami moya qarang ga,nano i ini kpiyox ro qmayah sraral iway haga ro,nano iyaw iyaw iyaw haga spmiyon ini kpiyox,kyan minkoko nanaq yo nannng lga,mwah kahat la,maras 怪手 laro,nano i sbnho qwara i mayah nyan laro,miyan naha qarang lga,yasa qa i pira misow qani piyox balay son maha qalang i qalang myan qani,nano ana ski misow qani na ga,qalang myan ga,yasa qa moya qarang maha i sqynox i goyo neng qani ga,nano qa moya qarang. . osa sqo qalang部落交通 Qalang myan qani ga,cyan maki i tonox son maha llyong Mnibo' qani,nano yasa i kmoyit so toroy kahol i hogan ga kahol heci mwah ga,si glox i son maha syaw llyong i Mnibo' qani,nano si prkyas prkyas ro,mwah Lmwan laro,prkyas lga Skikon lga,yasa mwah Pyanah la.ana ga saying qara toqiy nya ga,myoqo so mosa lga,phtox so Toyen ro ini ga mosa so 太平山ga,cyox qotox Pekos son naha ga,wa prkyas ga qotox toqiy ga,wa kya Toyen ga,ro mwah laga,te Thbo son naha Roba ga,cyox qotox toqiy loyiwa tqara loyi wal 太平山 la,nano yasa min'oqo so mlox toqiy qasa laga,iyat so tehok Pyanan la. Sami qalang Pyanan qani hoya ga,bahaw cyox maki son maha i soro balay rgyax ga,piyox balay son maha i blaq chalan ga,ro balaq nayan oyi,pira maha sami qalang Pyanan qani ga,cyox qotox son maha qori sqabo,qori sqabo qasa hiya ga,bagan ro kmisan ro tmango abaw ro hoqan abaw ga,ini ptnaq qwara kako nya ga,blaq balay ktan ga,qori' sqabo qasa hiya ga,taring sraral ga,yasa niqan nyan i galan myan i qoilh ga,qoilh hasa ga,mnbang so nyan ga櫻花鉤吻鮭,nano sraral ga,yasa galan myamn qolih,ro qalang myan hasa ga,maki balong oyi ga,maki son maha qaling son nyan ga,nano cyox qotox son 檜木園區,cyox qotox步道ga,okeq mosa mangay qa i qaling,ro qalang myan hasa ga,cyox maki qotox son maha mqabo n ptonox cyox kya oyi,blaq balay ktan 鐘乳石qasa ay,ana ga mwani ga,cyox shtox i kensexo ga,nyox shtoy maha ta say nqa i pcyaqih i 鐘乳石 qasa,misow qani ga,ini baqiy mosa haya,ro qotox loyi hapa balay ga i觀光nya lga,qanrang qani ro,qalang Pyanan qani ga,ita Taywan qani ga,si say ma hopa balay qa 菜區nya ga,mmiyan qanrang qani,nano mosa so qalang Pyanan qani ga,ktan so qwara mtasyeq qwara i qanrang ga,blaq balay ktan.khmay balay i kahat ga. tay mkraya' na Pyanan hya' ga Qalang skikon. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
